channel.title: Computers Food Itunes on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Computers Food Itunes on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: XLST for itunes
item.description: i wrote a couple of quick XSLT scripts last night. check em out here. there are two, one that renders it into HTML and one that renders it into XML. w00t. last night - I fixed computers for food. it was nice. I had GOOOOD food and desert. I love computers. they are my friend. time to do work.
